name: inebriating
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
making someone become drunk: Sometimes people take too much of an inebriating substance. The sea breeze was more inebriating than my beer. See
inebriate
More examplesFewer examplesThey discovered him slumped over his desk, following an inebriating lunch.Beer is as inebriating as wine.The cultivation of sugar made inebriating, cheap rum freely available.
